bwwExcerpt: These people all have magic to do, and over the course of two and a half hours, they deliver in relentless, surprising and cathartic ways. This revival, choreographed by Chet Walker "in the style" of original director Bob Fosse, is Fosse by way of the Flying Wallendas...Miller makes for a charismatic guide as the Leading Player, locking eyes with audience members throughout the evening...My advice is to judge this "Pippin" based on how it makes you feel, once you've separated that from all the d
